title: Son Gokuu no Hi no Youjin
synopsis: An educational "don't play with fire" safety video for kids featuring characters from the classic Saiyuuki folktale.
related_anime: ['Tezuka Osamu Monogatari: Boku wa Son Gokuu', 'Son Gokuu Silk Road wo Tobu!!', 'Boku no Son Gokuu', 'Saiyuuki: Son Gokuu Monogatari']
